In England, in the seven days to 01 December, there were 267,748 new confirmed cases (473.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 24 November, there were 249,718 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 7% (18,030 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 06 December is 8,918,807 (15,771.5 cases per 100,000 population).
